Package game.actions.attacks

Class FocusAction

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action
game.actions.attacks.FocusAction
public class FocusAction
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action
An action class representing the activation of a focus skill using a specific weapon. Authored by:

      public boolean maxFocusTurn​(int maxTurns)
      Check if the maximum number of focus turns has been reached.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
